explains: n. 莫哈韦沙漠（在美国加利福尼亚西南）

sentences.en: For protection from the summer sun, the Mojave lived in open-sided, flat-topped dwellings known as shades, each a roof of poles and arrow weed supported by posts set in a rectangle.
sentences.cn: 为了躲避夏季的阳光，莫哈韦人住在遮荫的开放式平顶住宅里，每个遮阳棚都由一根杆子和一个箭头杂草组成，并由一个矩形的柱子支撑。

sentences.en: And we hadn't even reached the Mojave Desert yet.
sentences.cn: 然而我们连莫哈韦沙漠还没有跑到。

sentences.en: Solar panels in the Mojave desert cover many kilometres.
sentences.cn: 莫哈韦沙漠里覆盖着数千公里的太阳能电池板。
